description: Robbie was not interested in talking at all. He was all over Joe and only had one thing on his mind: pounding ass, of course. We told Joe that there was something he should know about Robbie… “He’s hung like a horse.” Joe reacted, “Fuck. You love to do this to me.” Yes we do! He definitely took it like a champ.
title: Robbie & Joe: Bareback
